flavorText: Bleak rumors reached Trostani's ears. She decreed that no one should travel alone.

foreignData.flavorText: Düstere Gerüchte kamen Trostani zu Ohren. Sie verfügte, dass niemand allein reisen solle.
foreignData.name: Abkommen der Renner
foreignData.text: Bringe einen 3/3 grünen Zentauren-Kreaturenspielstein ins Spiel, und führe dann Bevölkern durch. (Bringe einen Spielstein ins Spiel, der eine Kopie eines Kreaturenspielsteins ist, den du kontrollierst.)

foreignData.flavorText: Rumores sombríos llegaron a oídos de Trostani. Decretó que nadie debía viajar en solitario.
foreignData.name: Acuerdo de cazadores
foreignData.text: Pon en el campo de batalla una ficha de criatura Centauro verde 3/3, luego repuebla. (Pon en el campo de batalla una ficha que es una copia de una ficha de criatura que controlas.)

foreignData.flavorText: Des rumeurs inquiétantes atteignirent les oreilles de Trostani. Elle décréta que plus personne ne devait voyager seul.
foreignData.name: Accord des coursiers
foreignData.text: Mettez sur le champ de bataille un jeton de créature 3/3 verte Centaure, puis peuplez. (Mettez sur le champ de bataille un jeton qui est une copie d'un jeton de créature que vous contrôlez.)

foreignData.flavorText: Dicerie inquietanti raggiunsero l'orecchio di Trostani. Decretò che nessuno avrebbe dovuto viaggiare da solo.
foreignData.name: Accordo dei Corsieri
foreignData.text: Metti sul campo di battaglia una pedina creatura Centauro 3/3 verde, poi popola. (Metti sul campo di battaglia una pedina che è una copia di una pedina creatura che controlli.)

foreignData.flavorText: うすら寒い噂がトロスターニの耳に届いた。彼女は決してひとりで出歩かぬようにとの命令を発した。
foreignData.name: 狩猟者の協定
foreignData.text: 緑の３/３のケンタウルス・クリーチャー・トークンを１体戦場に出し、その後居住を行う。（あなたがコントロールするクリーチャー・トークン１体のコピーであるトークンを１体戦場に出す。）

foreignData.flavorText: 절망적인 소문을 듣게 된 트로스타니는 아무도 혼자 돌아다니지 말라는 지시를 내렸다.
foreignData.name: 군마들의 합의
foreignData.text: 3/3 녹색 켄타우로스 생물 토큰 한 개를 전장에 놓은 후, 소집한다. (당신이 조종하는 어느 생물 토큰의 복사본인 토큰 한 개를 전장에 놓는다.)

foreignData.flavorText: Rumores desoladores chegaram aos ouvidos de Trostani. Ela decretou que ninguém deveria viajar sozinho.
foreignData.name: Acordo dos Caçadores
foreignData.text: Coloque no campo de batalha uma ficha de criatura verde 3/3 do tipo Centauro e depois povoe. (Coloque no campo de batalha uma ficha que seja uma cópia de uma ficha de criatura que você controla.)

foreignData.flavorText: Мрачные слухи дошли до Тростани. Она запретила кому бы то ни было путешествовать в одиночку.
foreignData.name: Договор Скакунов
foreignData.text: Положите на поле битвы одну фишку существа 3/3 зеленый Кентавр, затем используйте Заселение. (Положите на поле битвы одну фишку, являющуюся копией фишки существа под вашим контролем.)

foreignData.flavorText: 令人忧心的谣言已传入卓塔妮耳中。她下令任何人不得单独出行。
foreignData.name: 骏马相随
foreignData.text: 将一个3/3绿色半人马衍生生物放进战场，然后殖民。（将一个衍生物放进战场，此衍生物为由你操控的某衍生生物之复制品。）

foreignData.flavorText: 令人憂心的謠言已傳入卓塔妮耳中。她下令任何人不得單獨出行。
foreignData.name: 駿馬相隨
foreignData.text: 將一個3/3綠色半人馬衍生生物放進戰場，然後殖民。（將一個衍生物放進戰場，此衍生物為由你操控的某衍生生物之複製品。）

name: Coursers' Accord
originalText: Put a 3/3 green Centaur creature token onto the battlefield, then populate. (Put a token onto the battlefield that's a copy of a creature token you control.)

rulings.text: You can choose any creature token you control for populate. If a spell or ability puts a token onto the battlefield under your control and then instructs you to populate (as Coursers’ Accord does), you may choose to copy the token you just created, or you may choose to copy another creature token you control.
If you choose to copy a creature token that’s a copy of another creature, the new creature token will copy the characteristics of whatever the original token is copying.
The new creature token copies the characteristics of the original token as stated by the effect that put the original token onto the battlefield.

The new token doesn’t copy whether the original token is tapped or untapped, whether it has any counters on it or Auras and Equipment attached to it, or any noncopy effects that have changed its power, toughness, color, and so on.
Any “as [this creature] enters the battlefield” or “[this creature] enters the battlefield with” abilities of the new token will work.
If you control no creature tokens when you populate, nothing will happen.

text: Create a 3/3 green Centaur creature token, then populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)
